Title: Relates to reductions of payments in lieu of taxes
Summary: Relates to reductions of payments in lieu of taxes; provides that where such payment agreement is to be reduced due to a reassessment of the parcel of real property such agreement is related to, such reduction shall be phased in over 10 years if the reduction would negatively affect the revenues of a local government by more than 5%.
LawCode: Add Art 3-A ยง370, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to payment in lieu of taxes agreements
